Title: Confessions
Text:
—O Supreme Sentinel, the Great Imperator, I have never questioned you.

You led us from the farthest reaches of the sea to this land, teaching us to walk the righteous path and embrace joy.

Yet those who claim to be your servants have distorted your teachings. The masses remain silent, while those who stand by the truth are banished here.

May you forge our faith into spears, and our suffering into hardened shields. May you… grant us vengeance, or at the very least, a merciful rest.
